# extended line scans not executed in 2019-2020 winter season.

frame:
 - LidarCollect --ip 192.168.0.128 --frame 1 50 130 0.04 110 280 0.04

line (called by frame, during snowfall event):
 - LidarCollect --ip 192.168.0.128 --line 1 30 130 0.04 195 30
 - LidarCollect --ip 192.168.0.128 --line 1 115 125 0.02	276 30 spectralon

 Snowfall event parameters:
  - if [ $snowcount -gt 15 ] && [ $snowcount2 -gt 15 ]; then

POP Matrix:
#Local to global coordinate system transformation matrix.

-0.4854426815558259 0.5340290076995966 -0.6922126998685252 -4420551.6191688813000000

0.0000000000000000 0.0000000000000000 0.0000000000000000 1.0000000000000000
